listing.title: Plugins
listing.reloadNote: A full page reload on Perplexity.ai is required when changing plugin settings.

noPluginsFound.title: No plugins found
noPluginsFound.description: Try adjusting your search term/filters or <url>request a new one</url> 😉

disabledDependencies.title: One or more dependencies are disabled, please enable them to use this plugin:

dependencyWarnings.forcedDisabledDependencies: This plugin is disabled because one or more of its dependencies are not available.

lockdownOverlay.message: This plugin is not available at the moment

unavailable.message: This plugin is not available at the moment. Please check back later.

betterCodeBlocks.description: Customize the appearance and usability of code blocks.

languageOptions.failedToCreate: ❌ Failed to create new language option

delete.title: Delete Language Option
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this language option? This action cannot be undone.

betterThreadMessageToolbars.description: Useful tweaks to make the toolbar more compact and easier to use.

sticky.label: Stick to top
sticky.description: Always keep the toolbar visible at the top of the page when scrolling.

explicitModelName.label: Explicit Model Name
explicitModelName.description: Show the model name without hovering.

collapseEmptyThreadVisualCols.description: Remove the empty space on the right side of each message in a thread. Only for messages that explicitly don't have "Search images, Search videos, Generate Images" options on the right.

commandMenu.description: Similar to Mac's Spotlight / Windows's PowerToys Run, but inside Perplexity.
commandMenu.sideNote: Side note: Thread search is subject to rate limiting by Perplexity at any time.

languageModelSelector.description: Allow you to change your preferred language model <emphasis>anywhere</emphasis>. The selector can be found on all query boxes.

imageGenModelSelector.description: Allow you to change your preferred image generation model. The selector can be found on the image generation popover in any thread.

onCloudflareTimeoutAutoReload.description: Helpful when you are using VPNs, or when Perplexity/Cloudflare has issues with your ISP. Turn this on if you want to automatically reload the page when this occurs.
